Dr. Philipp Gschwandtner

Philipp is head of the Research Center HPC. He received his PhD in 2017, focusing on performance and energy analysis and optimization of parallel programs. His main interests lie in research and training in high performance computing and scientific computing, including adjacent topics such as programming model design, runtime systems, or compiler research.
